summary: Completed comprehensive testing of SwingAI PKScreener integration. All 33 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend screener page loads correctly with all 43+ scanner categories. AI Swing Candidates shows real stock data with prices and RSI. Fixed frontend bug where AI Nifty Outlook wasn't displaying data correctly.

integration_issues.issue: FIXED - Frontend was looking for data.data and data.ensemble but API returns data at root level with prediction object

critical_code_review_comments: Duplicate screener page existed at /app/frontend/app/(platform)/screener/ - removed to fix build error
context_for_next_testing_agent: PKScreener integration fully tested. All 11 scanner categories with 61 scanners work. AI features (Nifty Prediction, Market Regime, Trend Analysis) all return real data. Frontend screener page at /screener displays stock cards with prices, RSI, volume correctly.

features_tested.AI Swing Candidates: PASS - Returns real stock data with prices and RSI
features_tested.Nifty Prediction: PASS - Returns BEARISH direction with confidence
features_tested.Single stock scan: PASS - Returns stock data for RELIANCE
features_tested.Frontend screener page: PASS - Loads with all scanner categories
features_tested.AI Swing Candidates UI: PASS - Shows 18 stocks with real data
features_tested.AI Intelligence tab: PASS - Shows AI tools and Nifty Outlook
